docs.text: App Platform Strategy Workshop - Americas October 4 - October 6 Virtual event Application Platform Technical Strategy Workshop Agenda This is a 3 day technical workshop. Refer to the daily agenda pages from the left-navigation section. Agenda TechJam Agenda Presentations TBD Hands on Activities From the navigation menu , select the Daily Agenda and Activities item to view the daily agenda for this technical workshop. There, you will also find the links to the hands-on lab guides and information to accces the Skytap lab environments
